sentences: Aya Hisakawa (久川 綾, Hisakawa Aya, born November 12, 1968) is a Japanese voice actress and singer.

On February 14, 2018, she was announced as the new voice of Bulma in the Dragon Ball series, replacing original voice actress Hiromi Tsuru, who had held the role from the original anime's debut in 1986 to her death in 2017.
